    • Method Detail

      • animateSoundLevel

        public void animateSoundLevel(float soundLevel)
        Animates sound by modulating radius of a displayed circle. This animation just performs one raise and fall of the circle (radius).
        Parameters:
        soundLevel -

      • animateWaitSpinner

        public void animateWaitSpinner()
        Start wait spinner animation. ARC_PERIOD_SEC represents the period for the spinner arc to complete one revolution. This animation is continued indefinitely, until the animation stopped - animateNone().

      • animateNone

        public void animateNone()
        Stop current, if any, animation and change the button state to normal state.

      • getCurrentRadius

        public final float getCurrentRadius()
        Returns current radius of the voice animation circle.
        Returns:
        current radius for the animated circle.

      • setCurrentRadius

        public final void setCurrentRadius(float radius)
        Sets new radius for voice animation and requests for a new drawing.
        Parameters:
        radius - the new radius for voice animation.

        Set interaction listener for this view.
        Parameters:

      • setColorVoiceAnimation

        public void setColorVoiceAnimation(java.lang.String color)
        Sets the color of the animation for audio input from device's microphone.
        Parameters:
        color - The int value of the color.

      • setColorWaitSpinner

        public void setColorWaitSpinner(java.lang.String color)
        Sets the color of the animation for audio input from device's microphone.
        Parameters:
        color - The hex-decimal color code as a string, e.g. "#FFFFFF".

        public void setColorIconAwaitingResponse(java.lang.String color)

      • setAnimateOnImageSwitching

        public void setAnimateOnImageSwitching(boolean animate)
        Set the animation flag for switching image between microphone and bot. By default, the flag is false.
        Parameters:
        animate - true to activate animation otherwise false.
